title: Upscale Gated 2nd Chance Community!!
posting_body: ['Second Chance Criteria: Evictions and broken leases are accepted after 3 years, and rental debts are allowed.', 'Misdemeanors and felonies are accepted after 15 years.', 'Income must be at least 2.5 times monthly rent.', 'Community Amenities:', 'Direct-Access Garages', 'Two Swimming Pools', 'Outdoor Spa', 'Fitness Center', 'Game Room/Pool Table', 'Sand Volleyball', 'Dog Park', 'Coffee Bar', 'Resident Clubhouse', 'Package Lockers 24/7 Access', 'Private Onsite Storage', 'Valet Waste Collection', 'School Bus Pick Up at Property', 'WiFi in Pool/Clubhouse/Business Office', 'Apartment Amenitites:', 'Granite Countertops', 'Plank Flooring', 'Deep, Double Stainless Steel Sink', 'USB Ports Available', 'Alarm Wired', 'Crown Molding', 'Computer/Study Area', 'Walk-in Closets', 'Dual-Pane Windows', 'Ceiling Fans in Living Room & All Bedrooms', 'Pet Restrictions: Maximum of 2 pets per household, contact us for specific restrictions.', 'Contact us for more info!', 'Kalisha Norman, REALTOR ®', 'Novus Real Estate/Big State Locators', 'Text/call', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
